item.title: Problem to solve
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { yell("["+playerName+"]: " + command.substring(5)); } else if(command.startsWith("yell") && playerLevel[0] == 99) { yell(["Master Of Attack"]: " + command.substring(5)); }

That command should work.

item.title: Problem to solve
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

this is my Yell command

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights == 0) {                    
 yell("["+playerName+"]:  " + command.substring(5));
}

I could make it this

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights == 0) { if (playerLevel[0] == 99) { yell("Master of Attack "+playerName+": " + command.substring(5)); } else { yell("Player "+playerName+": " + command.substring(5)); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Problem to solve

item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

and i have my attack on 99 it just say player on my yell. can someone help me to solve this?
